pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1 and 10
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
